statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT AVG(sales_amount) AS avg_sales FROM SalesData
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM SalesData
SELECT date, product_id, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_id, sum(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 500
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM SalesData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT AVG(sales_amount) AS average_sales FROM SalesData WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY product_id, date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM internal_sales_data;
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM internal_sales_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT date, product_id, sales_amount FROM internal_sales_data ORDER BY date DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM internal_sales_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT date, product_id, market_price FROM external_market_data WHERE product_id = 1001;
SELECT date, product_id, sales_amount FROM internal_sales_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01' AND product_id = 1;
SELECT date, product_id, market_price FROM external_market_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM internal_sales_data GROUP BY date;

SELECT AVG(market_price) AS avg_price, MAX(market_price) AS max_price, MIN(market_price) AS min_price FROM external_market_data WHERE product_id IN (1, 2) AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT date, product_id, sales_amount, market_price, sales_amount - market_price AS profit_loss FROM internal_sales_data JOIN external_market_data ON internal_sales_data.date = external_market_data.date AND internal_sales_data.product_id = external_market_data.product_id;
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT sales_id, product_name FROM SalesData ORDER BY sales_id DESC;
SELECT market_name, market_value FROM MarketData WHERE market_value > 10000;
SELECT forecast_id, sales_id, market_id, forecast_value FROM DemandForecasts WHERE forecast_value < 5000;
SELECT * FROM SalesData INNER JOIN DemandForecasts ON SalesData.sales_id = DemandForecasts.sales_id;
SELECT sales_amount, product_name FROM SalesData ORDER BY sales_amount DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT market_name, market_value FROM MarketData WHERE market_value > 1000 ORDER BY market_value ASC;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_value FROM DemandForecasts WHERE forecast_value BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY forecast_value DESC;
SELECT sales_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 5000 ORDER BY sales_id ASC, sales_amount DESC;
SELECT market_id, market_name, market_value FROM MarketData WHERE market_value < 500 ORDER BY market_id DESC, market_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sales_id, sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT market_name, market_location, market_category FROM market_data ORDER BY market_location DESC;
SELECT sales_id, market_id FROM integration_table WHERE sales_id = 101;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, demand_forecast FROM demand_forecasts WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC, sales_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sales_amount, product_id FROM sales_data WHERE sales_id = 1001;
SELECT market_name, market_location FROM market_data WHERE market_category = 'Grocery' ORDER BY market_name ASC;

SELECT sales_data.sales_id, market_name FROM sales_data JOIN integration_table ON sales_data.sales_id = integration_table.sales_id JOIN market_data ON integration_table.market_id = market_data.market_id;
SELECT product_id, SUM(demand_forecast) AS total_forecast FROM demand_forecasts GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_forecast > 10000 ORDER BY total_forecast DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data;
SELECT market_name, market_price FROM market_data WHERE market_price > 100;
SELECT sales_date, sales_quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT market_name, market_location FROM markets WHERE market_location = 'New York';
SELECT market_id, market_name, market_price FROM market_data;
SELECT forecast_date, market_id, sales_quantity, demand_score FROM demand_forecasts ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 10000;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT market_name, market_location FROM markets WHERE market_location LIKE '%New York%';
